title: Cursed Sapling
summaries: The Cursed Sapling item is used to summon the Cursed Sapling pet, appearing as a small dark blue tree stump with a jagged head, a jack-o-lantern face, and roots which it walks on. The Cursed Sapling is dropped by the Mourning Wood during the Pumpkin Moon event with a 2 ~ 20% (5 ~ 20%) chance depending on the current wave.

statistics.Tooltip: Summons a cursed sapling to follow you
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
